item.title: Speech Datasets
item.description: Mozilla Common Voice Common Voice is Mozilla’s initiative to help teach machines how real people speak. The project is currently active and collective data from contributors. Download latest data Presidential Speeches Dhivehi speech data - data collected from PO MV (* 1 GB). Extracted and processed by Sofwath as part of a collection of Dhivehi datasets found here. Download from Google Drive

item.title: Text Datasets
item.description: Quran Translation Dhivehi Quran translation source files. Link to GitHub

item.title: OCR Datasets
item.description: Dash8x Thaana-Dataset A dataset of handwritten and computer generated Thaana glyphs Link to GitHub Akuru-MNIST Akuru-MNIST is a MNIST style akuru dataset for OCR (* 161 MB), from Sofwaths collection here. Link to Google Drive
